titles.secondTitleAbtUs: Technologies and Libraries Used in the Project

paragraphs.firstParaph: TecnoRSC is a store specialized in the sale of cutting-edge technological products. Our mission is to provide our customers with access to the latest technological innovations and offer them high-quality products that improve their daily lives, whether at work, home or entertainment.
paragraphs.secondParaph: We offer a wide range of technology products including:
paragraphs.thirdParaph: In the development of our project, we have used a series of technologies and libraries that play a fundamental role in the creation and management of our application. Below, we detail each of them:
paragraphs.fourthParaph: Together, these technologies and libraries have allowed us to develop an efficient, visually attractive and functional project. Each of them plays a fundamental role in different aspects of the team development and collaboration process. Thanks to these tools, we have managed to create a web application that meets our objectives and expectations.

items.firstLiAboutUs: Electronic Devices: From smartphones and tablets to laptops and desktop computers, we offer a diverse selection of electronic devices from top brands.
items.secondLiAboutUs: Technological Accessories: We complement our devices with a variety of accessories, such as cases, chargers, headphones, keyboards, mice and more.
items.thirdLiAboutUs: Entertainment Electronics: High definition TVs, sound systems, video game consoles and accessories for the home entertainment experience.
